name: Hey, I'm Fatih Koca! 👋
title: Innovating with Passion, Leading with Integrity.

characteristics: 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Proud husband to [Tuğba Koca](https://tugba.koca.app) and lucky dad of two awesome kids!
💻 Full-stack problem solver, UI/UX enthusiast, and tech geek
🏢 Co-founder at [Classest](https://classest.com) – where education meets innovation
🎨 I dabble in graphic design and make startups a reality
📱 Web dev, mobile app guru, frontend wizard, and a little bit of DevOps magic
🤖 Passionate about EdTech, HealthTech, AdTech... honestly, if it ends with “Tech,” count me in!
🦾 Big fan of tech, sports, and games – yes, I can multitask 🏊‍♂️⛹️‍♂️🎸🎮
bio: I’m an entrepreneurial spirit with over a decade of hands-on experience in software development, interface design, project management, and more. My journey has been fueled by a passion for innovation and a relentless drive to learn and grow in Computer Sciences.

As the co-founder of [Classest](https://classest.com) alongside my wife [Tuğba Koca](https://tugba.koca.app), I’m incredibly proud of the impact we’re making in the world of education. Building Classest from the ground up together has been a thrilling and motivating adventure, pushing us to blend our skills in tech and business to create something truly transformative.

I’m a minimalist design enthusiast who loves turning complex challenges into elegant solutions. Whether it’s optimizing infrastructure costs or developing a new brand identity, I approach every project with a fresh perspective and a commitment to excellence.

My strong communication skills enable me to collaborate effectively with product managers, designers, engineers and other key players to tackle problems head-on. Whether working under guidance or taking initiative independently, I’m driven by a deep-seated motivation to achieve efficiency and success.
With 10 years of professional experience in my toolkit, I’m always excited to dive into new challenges and make a lasting difference.

Looking to build your next big thing or need a seasoned frontend developer to take your app to the next level? I’m your guy! Don’t hesitate to reach out if you’re hiring, collaborating, or just curious about what I can bring to the table. Let's talk! 🚀
